## Prerequisites

To start this case study, you'll need the following software:

- MySQL database
- MySQL Workbench
- Anaconda

## Installation

- MySQL (select "No thanks, just start my download")
  - [Windows](https://dev.mysql.com/downloads/installer/)
  - [Mac](https://dev.mysql.com/downloads/mysql/)

- [MySQL Workbench](https://dev.mysql.com/downloads/workbench/)

- [Anaconda](https://www.anaconda.com/download)

## Anaconda Environment

Install the Anaconda Environment `env-mr-pip.yml`

- [💾 Anaconda Environment](https://github.com/kirenz/environments)
